text: Parliamentary elections were held in Laos on 24 August 1947.Dieter Nohlen, Florian Grotz & Christof Hartmann (2001) Elections in Asia: A data handbook, Volume II, p135 The elections were held on a non-partisan basis, with all candidates running as independents.Nohlen et al., p137 ==References== Category:1947 elections in Asia 1947 Parliamentary election Category:Non- partisan elections
title: 1947 Laotian parliamentary election
